title: Losing my promos to get plat 1 even though I was only 1:1

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I won the velkoz game and the darius game where I went 4/8.

I then got into my promos and won the Darius game going 7/6, I then lost the Graves game. Shouldnt I be getting one more chance for plat 1 since it's based off 3 games? This is also a question: Were promos changed or am I very very stupid.

replies.body: Aw, bummer!  I looked into this and it does look that there was a dodge once your mini series started.  A [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) followed by a loss ended the series.  :/  That only put you 10 LP away from another series though, you can do it!  Best of luck!!
Thanks for the help, I'll pay more attention next time!
Did you have a dodge sometime during the promo series? That will be treated as a loss.
Nope, just constantly played some games when i was doing good. Then one loss means I lose promos like wat.
